steps.description: Run at speed to the far end of the arena past the end marker and do a left rollback—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Run at speed to the far end of the arena past the end marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the left with no hesitation.

steps.description: Run to the opposite end of the arena past the end marker and do a right rollback—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Run to the opposite end of the arena past the end marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the right with no hesitation.

steps.description: Run past the center marker and do a sliding stop. Back up to center of the arena or at least ten feet. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Run past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Back up to center of the arena or at least ten feet.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the right. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the right.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four and one-quarter spins to the left so that horse is facing left wall or fence. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four and one-quarter spins to the left so that horse is facing left wall or fence.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Beginning on the left lead, complete three circles to the left: the first circle large and fast; the second circle small and slow; the third circle large and fast. Change leads at the center of the arena.

primitives.description: Beginning on the left lead, complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a small slow circle to the left.
Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Change leads at the center of the arena.

steps.description: Complete three circles to the right: the first circle large and fast; the second circle small and slow; the third circle large and fast. Change leads at the center of the arena.

primitives.description: Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a small slow circle to the right.
Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Change leads at the center of the arena.

steps.description: Begin a large circle to the left but do not close this circle. Run straight up the right side of the arena past the center marker and do a sliding stop at least twenty feet from wall or fence. Hesitate to demonstrate the completion of the pattern.

primitives.description: Begin a large circle to the left but do not close this circle.
Run straight up the right side of the arena past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop at least twenty feet from wall or fence.
Back up at least ten feet.
Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.
